entry.title: Demon on His Shoulders
entry.summary:
Author: Mekanamin02

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,237Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 46

Summary: Loner demon lord, Derek Hale just wants a quiet day to himself. One day, is all he asks. But one moment he's at home and the next he's standing in front of a frail old lady jumping to make a demon deal with him. He REALLY doesn't want to accept the deal but... circumstances. So now he's inserting himself into the life of a certain Stiles Stilinski to play his part but perhaps this will be a deal of Derek's millennia-long existence that he will never forget.~*~An unstoppable scream wrenches its way out of the demon as the feeling overpowers every sense in his body. He knows he’s gripping the woman’s arm too tightly, but he can’t seem to care when it feels like his core is igniting from within.Somewhere on the other side of the county, a boy gasps awake beside a hospital bed. There’s beeping behind him, loud, counting down. He sighs and stands, rolls his heavy shoulders and got to work, not realising he has a demon riding on his shoulders now. A demon his grandmother traded her life to protect him.

entry.title: It Wears Your Face
entry.summary:
Author: amatorial

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,161Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 17

Summary: Derek was smiling—excited, rare, and real in a way Stiles hadn’t seen in years. That was all it took. He followed him into the woods, chasing that warmth like it might slip away.But something else came back with him.Now there’s something in the dark. It watches. It waits. And it feels too close, too familiar.Stiles is starting to forget where the nightmare ends and love begins.Because when what’s hunting you feels like the person you’d do anything for… how do you stop yourself from giving in?

entry.title: i've known the warmth of your doorways
entry.summary:
Author: buttercup_beetle

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,500Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 33

Summary: “Hey babe,” he gasps.“Hi,” Derek replies. He’s got blood smeared all over his arms, and down his bare chest. From the wetness splattered on his own face, Stiles suspects that he’s not much better.“Rough day?”Derek cracks a bare smile. A glint of his fang peeks out from his lips. “You could say that.”Stiles sighs, wipes his filthy hands on his soiled jeans, and rolls up to his knees. “I’ll go get the body bag from the trunk,” he says, and Derek nods. “Then, you can explain to me what the hell just happened.”

entry.title: Redlight
entry.summary:
Author: mossriddened

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,260Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 88

Summary: Stiles saw the red light, staring ahead as it passed overhead -- and kept going. He didn’t even stop.He didn’t even flinch.It felt almost as if he wasn’t truly present in the driver’s seat, instead being somewhere behind the wheel, watching through the windshield as if it were nothing more than a screen. He felt floaty, entirely detached.He barely registered the speedometer as it climbed, streetlights streaking into lines in his window. He barely registered when red and blue lights joined in the mix behind him, almost blinding in the rearview mirrors as colors blended together.It was just lights.–––––––––or . .Stiles Stilinski gets put on house arrest for his own safety after breaking several traffic violations and running from the police. Although he can no longer drive away from his problems, he finds them, instead, in his reflection.

entry.title: Designation 19621
entry.summary:
Author: fanficreader5

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,774Chapters: 13/19Kudos: 477

Summary: “My designation is 19621, sir.” Stiles stares at him. “That's quite the mouthful. Any chance you have a, like, normal name?” “Derek,” the cleaner says eventually. He looks at the red button on the wall and then glances away. Stiles follows his gaze and blanches. “Dude, I’m not gonna shock you for telling me your name.”_____The new werewolf cleaner for Stiles' PhD group is grumpy and aloof and maybe a genius. As Stiles gets to know him, he can't help but wonder if there's any way to get that collar off him.

entry.summary:
Author: idyllic_dae

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,552Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 133

Summary: "He's harmless. Look at him," Derek says, and Stiles bristles."I am not—""You smell what I do," Talia speaks over him. "Do not be so easily fooled."Stiles isn't sure whose side to take. If he agrees with Talia, he argues against being set free. If he agrees with Derek, he admits he's weak and helpless. Neither option is appealing."Yes," Derek says. entry.title: miss the feeling
entry.summary:
Author: blueinkedbones

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,209Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 35

Summary: It's not like it was ever about running. Stiles went to college, it was fine, he graduated, it was fine, and now he's an adult. The funny thing about that is that nobody feels like the adult in the room unless they have to be. That's that whole... bystander effect thing, why you have to assign someone to do one exact task, because if you're just like, "Somebody call 911!" everyone'd just look at everyone else. Like, who's the guy? Who's been nominated? Oh, shit, I guess it's gotta be me.Except nothing all that exciting's happened to Stiles in years. Or even to Derek, apparently, who was always bizarrely chill any time Stiles tried to check in with him. Take away the constant chaos that kept throwing them together, and apparently, Derek has nothing to say to him at all.Not that that's even surprising. It's not like he's ever been chatty. Stiles was always the one supplying two-thirds of the conversation.Did he have a theory about how that might change over time? Maybe. But it's been pretty firmly debunked! Over years now.So... whatever. Whatever, that's cool.Neat, neat, neat-o.

  • No Archive Warnings Apply

entry.title: Shadows in the Fog
entry.summary:
Author: Cwoffee_is_Life

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,885Chapters: 16/16Kudos: 9

Summary: Beacon Hollow's got rules: don't ask questions, don't trust witches, and don't walk alone after dark.Stiles breaks all three the night a body turns up carved with runes that match the ones in his dead mother's journal. Now the city's bleeding secrets, the Argents are circling like sharks, and Stiles is in over his head with bar- owning werewolf who growls more than he talks.In a city where everyone's hiding something, Stiles is about to find out the truth bites back.

Summary: Edward and Dick finally go on a well deserved honeymoon, on an island resort. They go about being a normal couple, mingling with other newlyweds and families.Then their young bartender is murdered and their idyllic honeymoon gets put on hold as Dick is put on the case. If only he would stop feeling so sick….
